block.vs_logistics.fluid_pump.tooltip.be: Moves fluid from the pump _into_ a connected Fluid Port.
_Extracts_ fluid from the connected tank _back into_ the pump.
block.vs_logistics.fluid_pump.tooltip.su: Transfer fluids between the _world_ and your _VS ships_. Switch modes to control the direction of flow.
vs_logistics.ponder.fluid_port.text_1: Fluid Ports allow compact fluid transfer on VS ships.
vs_logistics.ponder.fluid_port.text_2: Link the Port to any Fluid Storage.
vs_logistics.ponder.fluid_port_2.text_1: Fluid Port linking only works once the VS Ship has been assembled.
vs_logistics.ponder.fluid_port_2.text_2: For ship-to-world transfer, fluids must be actively pumped out of the Port.
